title: More Runes???
body: Personally I feel like if riot is gonna implement more runes they should at least get rid of the old ones. It doesn't feel like a good addition if you're gonna make the old runes obsolete in my opinion.

replies.body: The rune and mastery system is getting a complete overhaul! The new runes will be coming in preseason, the same time that the old systems get removed.

The Rune system is getting revamped. When the preseason hits, Runes will be **completely** different. You can read more about the new runes [**here**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-update?utm_source=LeagueClient&utm_medium=OverviewTier1).
